business.title: Yahoo
business.info: “Yahoo” is an acronym for “Yet Another Hierarchical Officious Oracle.”

business.title: Starbucks
business.info: Starbucks’ round tables were created specifically so customers would feel less alone.

business.title: Pepsi
business.info: Pepsi got its name from the digestive enzyme pepsin.

business.title: Happy B'day
business.info: Warner Music owns the copyrights to “Happy Birthday,” so it’s technically owed royalties every time you sing it to someone on their big day.

business.title: Mc Donalds
business.info: McDonald’s first menu items were hot dogs, not hamburgers.
